channel.title: Captain Planet on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Captain Planet and the Planeteers’ Live-Action Series Set at Netflix
item.description: “Captain Planet and the Planeteers,” an animated TBS series from the ’90s about an environmentalist superhero, is being adapted into a live-action series at Netflix with Greg Berlant
